alert.note: Alert for Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 2:21PM PST until January 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph through Wednesday afternoon. Winter Storm Warning for even stronger winds and accumulating snow in effect starting at 4 PM PST Wednesday. * WHERE...Northern Ventura County Mountains and Interstate 5 Corridor including the Grapevine. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains
